scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others "npx ecstatic public" "npm run watch-css" "watchify src/chat.js -p esmify -dv -o public/chat.js"
scripts.start: npm run chat && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.chat: mkdir -p public/chat && cp src/_chat.html public/chat/index.html && browserify src/chat.js -p esmify -dv > public/chat.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p public && rm -rf ./public/* && npm run copy && node ./build.js && npm run css && npm run build-envelope && npm run build-animation && npm run chat && npm run build-ntl-button && npm run build-postcards && npm run well-known && npm run build-js
scripts.build-ntl-button: mkdir -p public/ssc && cp src/ssc/* public/ssc && browserify src/ssc/index.js -p esmify -dv > public/ssc/bundle.js
scripts.build-postcards: rm -rf public/postcards && mkdir -p public/postcards && cp src/postcards/*.jpg src/postcards/*.png src/postcards/*.jpeg public/postcards && node src/postcards/_index.js
scripts.build-envelope: npm run copy-envelope && node ./build-envelope.js && cp src/envelope/envelope.js public/envelope/envelope.js && postcss src/envelope/envelope.css --use postcss-nesting > public/envelope/envelope.css && esbuild --bundle --sourcemap=inline --format=esm ./node_modules/ky/distribution/index.js --outfile=./public/ky.js && esbuild ./node_modules/@ssc-half-light/request/src/index.ts --sourcemap=inline --bundle --format=esm --outfile=./public/request.js && esbuild ./node_modules/@ssc-half-light/envelope/src/index.ts --sourcemap=inline --bundle --format=esm --outfile=./public/envelope.js && esbuild ./node_modules/@ssc-half-light/message/src/index.ts --sourcemap=inline --bundle --format=esm --outfile=./public/message.js
scripts.copy-envelope: mkdir -p public && cp ./node_modules/@nichoth/tonic/dist/tonic.min.js ./public && cp ./node_modules/@ssc-half-light/identity/dist/index.min.js ./public/identity.js && cp ./node_modules/@oddjs/odd/dist/index.esm.min.js public/odd.js
scripts.copy: cp src/_static/* public && cp src/animate.js public && cp src/favicon.ico public && mkdir -p public/font && cp src/font/* public/font && cp src/index.html public && mkdir -p public/img && cp src/img/*.* public/img/
scripts.//deploy: npm run build && surge public  <-- obsolete b/c netlify
